titleStmt.title: Memorable historick descriptiones draven [sic]. From the sacred bookes insert in the subsequent page. By Alexander Garden..
titleStmt.author: Garden, Alexander, 1585?-1634?

titleStmt.title: Memorable historick descriptiones draven [sic]. From the sacred bookes insert in the subsequent page. By Alexander Garden..
titleStmt.author: Garden, Alexander, 1585?-1634?

biblFull.extent: [119] p., [9+?] leaves of plates : ill., ports.

notesStmt.note: Device on t.p.: bird with spread wings holding a scroll in its beak , with motto below "Nil penna, sed usus"; initials.
Error in register: F₅ numbered F₃.
Imperfect: cropped, stained, with print show-through, and loss of text. Of the nine extant plates, four are torn, three of those mostly torn out, possibly some plates lacking entirely.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
